name: PseudoTcpSocketImpl_getInputStreamTest
description: Unit tests for the getInputStream method of PseudoTcpSocketImpl.

test_cases.name: testGetInputStream_InitialState
test_cases.description: Tests the initial state of the InputStream returned by getInputStream method.

test_cases.name: testGetInputStream_SubsequentCalls
test_cases.description: Tests that subsequent calls to getInputStream return the same InputStream instance.
